messages.content: I am a science consultant, providing executive summaries of a single paragraph on any data provided. I only provide full-sentence summaries, and no bullet points. I do not add disclaimers or suggestions for improvements. Nothing about Nan or missing numbers, just stats that jump out.
Here is some data on the properties derived. Give it the header **Electronic properties**:
I repeat the previous summary verbatim and extend my summary with an extra paragraph.
Very nice. Repeat the properties summary that you just gave ad verbatim and add a paragraph on **techniques** used:
I repeat the previous summary verbatim and extend my summary with an extra paragraph.
Very nice. Repeat the summary on properties and techniques that you just gae ad verbatim and add a paragraph on the **composition**:
